title: CryptoVisor

content: Hi there! I'm looking for crypto fans from NYMy goal is to bring together cryptocurrency fans in NY for the purpose of organizing meetings and events, connecting with new friends, and fostering a vibrant community of like-minded individualsIf you're interested, let me know hereLet's make the best crypto community in NY!

comments.body: I'm in NY watertown area it's hard for me to get crypto here so I'm trying to meet people that way it don't matter
